goal: Enhance Meta Agentic AI System with improved agent communication and testing framework.
acceptance_criteria: All inter-agent communication should be done using the new protocol.
Unit tests for the new protocol should pass with a coverage of at least 90%.
Agents running in isolated containers should not interfere with each other's operations.
README.md should have clear instructions for setting up and running containerized agents.
tasks: Develop a new protocol for inter-agent communication using Swift.
Implement unit tests for the new communication protocol in Tests directory.
Create isolated containers for each agent as per security guidelines.
Update README.md to include setup instructions for containerized agents.
